dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Steube introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for any DEI activity in the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eliminate DEI in the Military Act.

section.header: Prohibition on use of funds for diversity, equity, and inclusion activities in the military

subsection.text: No Federal funds may be obligated or expended for any DEI activity of—

paragraph.text: The term DEI activity includes, with respect to diversity, equity, and inclusion—

The term national service academy means the United States Military Academy, the United States Naval Academy, the United States Air Force Academy, the United States Coast Guard Academy, or the United States Merchant Marine Academy.
